page.title: 13DOG BREEDING
page.content: We visited some kenels called{ {Portmans Hay Rodley Kennels.}They have got 20 dogs at the moment.The dogs are {Cairn Terriers} and sell for Â£120 each. They sell very quickly. The big dogs are fed on 1 pound of meat and biscuits and the small dogs on 6 ounces of meat and biscuits a day. At{Cleeve Bungalow}they have got 30 dogs. They are all{Greyhounds}.The kennel has been open for 16 years and the lady in charge started by getting dogs from Ireland. The dogs cost Â£7 a week to keep and they are fed twice a day if they are { {racing dogs} and four times a day if they are puppies. The dogs are raced all over the country and are not for sale although they are bred at the kennels.
